column2: Mediaco Holding, Inc. is a radio broadcasting media company. The company is headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana. The firm owns and operates two radio stations located in New York. The Company’s assets consist of WQHT-FM and WBLS-FM. The Company’s services include on-air commercial broadcast time, event sponsorship and digital advertising services. The Company’s stations conduct ticket sales and sponsorship of events in their local market. The firm provides digital marketing services, including display advertisements and video sponsorships to advertisers. The firm provides advertising broadcast time in exchange for certain products and services, including on-air radio programming.
